extendedInfo.description: Ecotextile News is an easy-to-use, free app that provides environmental news from the worldâs most influential textile B2B magazine.Stay informed on the ever-changing environmental landscape of the global textile industry with up-to-the-minute breaking news, incisive comment and access to thousands of searchable news items written by the textile industryâs top journalists.What the app providesâ¢	Instant breaking news 24/7â¢	Choice of news channelâ¢	Smart search facilityâ¢	Features and archived material â¢	Digitised magazine back issuesâ¢	Share news with Facebook and Twitterâ¢	Popular and Most Read storiesâ¢	Font size optionsâ¢	Easy loginâ¢	News alertsâ¢	Environmental image bank â¢	Rich and rewarding user experienceWho should download the app?â¢	Forward thinkers and visionariesâ¢	Every clothing retailer or brand on the planetâ¢	Fabric specifiers and textile buyersâ¢	Textile mills everywhereâ¢	CSR and sustainability teamsâ¢	NGOâs and environmental organisationsâ¢	Climate change scepticsâ¢	You and meNews Channelsâ¢	Fashion & Retailâ¢	Dyes & Chemicalsâ¢	Materials & Productionâ¢	Labels & Legislationâ¢	Technologyâ¢	Conferences & EventsBack issuesâ¢	Complete back issue catalogue to 2007â¢	High quality graphicsâ¢	Pdf formatâ¢	Control with swipeâ¢	Easy to readâ¢	Back issues for subscribers onlyGalleriesâ¢	Unique environmental galleryâ¢	High quality photographyâ¢	Personal touch images from the editorial teamPlease note: This app is free to use but requires users to register a username and password with Ecotextile News in order to read full stories.Premium content and back issue archive is locked for subscribers only.Terms of use:â¢	All content in the Ecotextile News app is copyright to MCL Global 2012. All rights reserved.â¢	Terms of use and privacy policy apply when accessing content via the Ecotextile News app.

reviews.title: nice free app for ecotextile news
reviews.comment: great way to keep up to date. app works well on my galaxy tablet :)

reviews.title: Just what I needed.
reviews.comment: A very easy to use and nice looking app. No complaints so far. Thanks ETN team.
